code: import React from'react';import'./Pagination.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Pagination=_ref=>{let{currentPage,totalPages,onPageChange}=_ref;const getPageNumbers=()=>{const pages=[];const maxVisible=5;if(totalPages<=maxVisible){for(let i=1;i<=totalPages;i++){pages.push(i);}}else{if(currentPage<=3){for(let i=1;i<=4;i++){pages.push(i);}pages.push('...');pages.push(totalPages);}else if(currentPage>=totalPages-2){pages.push(1);pages.push('...');for(let i=totalPages-3;i<=totalPages;i++){pages.push(i);}}else{pages.push(1);pages.push('...');for(let i=currentPage-1;i<=currentPage+1;i++){pages.push(i);}pages.push('...');pages.push(totalPages);}}return pages;};if(totalPages<=1)return null;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"pagination",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"page-btn",onClick:()=>onPageChange(currentPage-1),disabled:currentPage===1,children:"\u2190 Previous"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"page-numbers",children:getPageNumbers().map((page,index)=>page==='...'?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"ellipsis",children:"..."},"ellipsis-".concat(index)):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"page-btn ".concat(currentPage===page?'active':''),onClick:()=>onPageChange(page),children:page},page))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"page-btn",onClick:()=>onPageChange(currentPage+1),disabled:currentPage===totalPages,children:"Next \u2192"})]});};export default Pagination;
